titleStmt.title: A journal of the most remarkable occurrences that happened between His Majesties army and the forces under the command of Mareschal de Schomberg in Ireland from the twelfth of August to the 23th of October, 1689 faithfully collected by James Nihell, Esq; Under Secretary to the R.H. the Earl of Melfort, His Majesties P.S. of S.
titleStmt.author: Nihell, James.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, and tightly bound, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
